entries.name: cookies
entries.desc: Get the cookies as a hash of cookie-name=>Cookie pairs.

entries.name: files
entries.desc: Get the uploaded files as a hash of name=>values pairs

entries.name: params
entries.desc: Get the parameters as a hash of name=>values pairs, where values is an Array.

entries.name: [](key)
entries.desc: Get the value for the parameter with a given key.

entries.name: has_key?(*args)
entries.desc: Returns true if a given query string parameter exists.

entries.name: keys(*args)
entries.desc: Return all query parameter names as an array of String.

entries.name: multipart?()
entries.desc: Returns whether the form contained multipart/form-data

entries.name: raw_cookie()
entries.desc: Get the raw cookies as a string.

entries.name: raw_cookie2()
entries.desc: Get the raw RFC2965 cookies as a string.
